pageContext.title: Case Study: Can AI improve how we treat each other online?
pageContext.excerpt: AOL, Salon, and Newsweek drove a healthier conversation experience for their readers with our newest Real-time Feedback tool, powered by Jigsaw’s Perspective API. Quality conversations are key to turning casual visitors into return readers. Our tools are proven to change the way your readers interact with content – and with each other. The case studyRead More
pageContext.content:
AOL, Salon, and Newsweek drove a healthier conversation experience for their readers with our newest Real-time Feedback tool, powered by Jigsaw’s Perspective API.

Quality conversations are key to turning casual visitors into return readers. Our tools are proven to change the way your readers interact with content – and with each other.

The case study reveals:

  • How to nurture positive communities and conversations with our powerful quality framework;
  • That user behavior can be changed in real-time, and how; and
  • How user behavior changes collectively influence overall community health.

seo.title: Build Your Community with Quality Conversations
seo.metaDesc: It’s time for quality conversations online. OpenWeb's community engagement and commenting system turns publishers into hosts, comments into conversations, and casual readers into active, vibrant communities.
seo.opengraphDescription: It's time to save online conversations
